pages.title: Health Boost
pages.text: Needs a golden apple to craft. Increases maximum health by 4 points per level.
$(br)Upgrade Costs:$(br)$(li)Health Boost I - 1$(li)Health Boost II - 8$(li)Health Boost III - 16$(li)Health Boost IV - 24$(li)Health Boost V - 32$(li)Health Boost VI - 40$(li)Health Boost VII - 48
